statements: SELECT * FROM customer_purchases WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, purchase_amount FROM customer_purchases WHERE purchase_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT product_id, purchase_date FROM customer_purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 100.00;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount FROM customer_purchases WHERE product_id = 5 ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM customer_purchases;
SELECT * FROM customer_purchases WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM customer_purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_products > 5;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(purchase_amount) AS average_amount FROM customer_purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT product_id) AS unique_products, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_spent FROM customer_purchases GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_purchases WHERE purchase_amount >= 100 ORDER BY customer_id ASC, purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT c.customer_name, p.purchase_amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.purchase_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT customer_name AS Name, email_address AS Email, loyalty_points AS Points FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points < 50 ORDER BY Points DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchases.purchase_amount > 1000;

SELECT customer_name, email_address, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount < 500 ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT promo_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE end_date > '2021-10-31';
SELECT c.customer_name, p.total_amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.total_amount >= 1000;
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id

SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, amount, promotion_name FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN promotions pr ON p.product_id = pr.promotion_id WHERE discount_rate > 0.2
SELECT c.customer_name, pc.category_name FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN product_categories pc ON p.product_id = pc.category_id
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM product_categories WHERE category_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM purchases JOIN customers ON purchases.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_name LIKE '%John%' AND amount > 50;
SELECT promotion_name, discount_rate FROM promotions WHERE discount_rate >= 0.1 ORDER BY discount_rate DESC;

SELECT customer_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount_spent FROM purchases JOIN customers ON purchases.customer_id = customers.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_amount_spent > 500 ORDER BY total_amount_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE membership_level = 'Gold';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, discount FROM Promotions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT customer_name, promotion_name FROM Customers JOIN CustomerPromotions ON Customers.customer_id = CustomerPromotions.customer_id JOIN Promotions ON CustomerPromotions.promotion_id = Promotions.promotion_id;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE membership_level = 'Premium';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount AS spent FROM Customers c JOIN Purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT customer_name, promotion_name, discount FROM Customers c JOIN CustomerPromotions cp ON c.customer_id = cp.customer_id JOIN Promotions p ON cp.promotion_id = p.promotion_id ORDER BY discount ASC;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(cp.promotion_id) AS num_promotions FROM Customers c LEFT JOIN CustomerPromotions cp ON c.customer_id = cp.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id HAVING num_promotions >= 2;
